text: How can you do Co-routines using C#?
In python the yield keyword can be used in both push and pull contexts, I know how to do the pull context in c# but how would I achieve the push.
I post the code I am trying to replicate in c# from python:

code:
def coroutine(func):
  def start(*args,**kwargs):
    cr = func(*args,**kwargs)
    cr.next()
    return cr
  return start

@coroutine
def grep(pattern):
  print "Looking for %s" % pattern
  try:
    while True:
      line = (yield)
      if pattern in line:
        print line,
  except GeneratorExit:
    print "Going away. Goodbye"
